tweets.text:
Dear @realDonaldTrump and @GOP 

So far this year 1038 people have been shot and killed in America. THIS is your national emergency. If you really care about the safety of the people you’re supposed to serve, stop obsessing about the wall and do something about gun violence.

The silence around the execution-style murders of five women in a bank in Florida is deafening. We are *this* used to gun violence. Those women were shot in the head after being forced to lay face down. And then executed. In a bank. In America.

What do Bernie Bros & Trumpkins have in common? An odd belief that they alone have some sort of ordained right to talk shit, a warrant to tear people apart without any retaliation. Not this time, assholes. I’m all for unity, but first we gotta remove the gun pointing at our head.

GUN RUNNER’s first foal was born at Shadai Farm in Japan on January 17th. She is out of Giulia Seattle and is absolutely stunning. Can’t wait to see what his other foals look like!! #gunrunner #horseoftheyear #champion https://t.co/T9dNTm0Q4F

Approx one third of female murder victims in the US are killed by intimate partners--and, most of the time, these criminals use a gun. My bill stops convicted stalkers & those who've committed acts of domestic violence from buying these weapons. https://t.co/t6tw9DjMcl

The lawmakers in this country - state and federal - are about 80% male. Women are not making the laws and policies that keep our families - and our mothers, sisters and daughters - safe from gun violence. We must run for office. We must get off the sidelines. We must ACT. https://t.co/sjz2gLIRTP

In Lusaka, at Kabulonga, I went to a ATM to withdraw some cash. I was approached by a soldier with a gun who asked me to lend him money for transport to his village. I felt I had no choice and gave him the money. One month later I met the soldier again. He gave me the money back!
